at.erp.light.view.controller.article

Class DeliveryController

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.erp.light.view.controller.article.DeliveryController

  • @RestController
public class DeliveryController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a RestController.
    It manages all calls concerning all sorts of deliveries.
    Author:
    Matthias Schnöll

      • getAllIncomingDeliveries

        @RequestMapping(value="secure/incomingDelivery/getAll")
public java.util.List<IncomingDeliveryDTO> getAllIncomingDeliveries()
        Returns a list with all incoming deliveries.
        Archived incoming deliveries are also included.
        Returns:
        list with all incoming deliveries

public IncomingDeliveryDTO getIncomingDeliveryById(@PathVariable

      • setIncomingDeliveryState

        @RequestMapping(value="secure/incomingDelivery/setArchivedState/{id}/{state}")
public ControllerMessage setIncomingDeliveryState(@PathVariable
                                                        int id,
                                                        @PathVariable
                                                        int state,
                                                        javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Set incoming delivery to archived state via id
        Parameters:
        id - of the requested delivery
        state - 0=unarchived; 1=archived
        Returns:
        ControllerMessage showing the success of the call

      • generateDeliveryListById

        @RequestMapping(value="secure/deliveryList/exportAsWord/{id}")
public void generateDeliveryListById(@PathVariable
                                           int id,
                                           javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse httpServletResponse)
        Exports the deliverList with the given Id as word file.
        The word file is returned by writing the File object to the response stream.
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the delivery list
        httpServletResponse -
